item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Gukesh becomes the youngest chess world champion in history (484 points | 202 comments)
2. ChatGPT's Advanced Voice Mode adds Santa Mode, Live Video, Screensharing (15 points | 1 comment)
3. Fermat's Last Theorem – how it's going (127 points | 64 comments)
4. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (492 points | 101 comments)
5. Programming Language Memory Models (2021) (28 points | 5 comments)
6. Doctor Who theme: Ron Grainer (composer) Delia Derbyshire (musician, arranger) (41 points | 7 comments)
7. Show HN: Lfi – a lazy functional sync, async, and concurrent iteration library (16 points | 4 comments)
8. Great Question (YC W21) Is Hiring People Operations Manager ( | hide)
9. Show HN: Quantus – LeetCode for Financial Modeling (128 points | 30 comments)
10. Show HN: Kubernetes Spec Explorer (53 points | 9 comments)
11. How a middle schooler found a new compound in a piece of goose poop (70 points | 26 comments)
12. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (677 points | 264 comments)
13. BlenderGPT (188 points | 108 comments)
14. Android XR (95 points | 91 comments)
15. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (925 points | 456 comments)
16. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (399 points | 693 comments)
17. Show HN: Credit reports about German companies (4 points | discuss)
18. Show HN: Gentrace – connect to your LLM app code and run/eval it from a UI (7 points | discuss)
19. The FDA Hasn't Inspected This Drug Factory After 7 Recalls for the Same Flaw (64 points | 23 comments)
20. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (202 points | 42 comments)
21. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (342 points | 501 comments)
22. Review of Mullvad VPN (429 points | 171 comments)
23. Mouseless – fast mouse control with the keyboard (115 points | 60 comments)
24. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (72 points | 11 comments)
25. The Cold Email Handbook (312 points | 175 comments)
26. Dear OAuth Providers (367 points | 119 comments)
27. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (168 points | 103 comments)
28. The GPU is not always faster (191 points | 91 comments)
29. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (453 points | 277 comments)
30. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (124 points | 71 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 6:25 PM UTC
